tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had ACL reconstruction surgery about 12 months before. During my first consultation with the doctor, he explained what might be the issue behind twisting of knee even with a slight disbalance and asked me to go for an MRI. The reports confirm that the ACL was completely torn, and Dr. Kunal did an ACL reconstruction surgery at Max Hospital in Shalimar Bagh. I am writing this review almost nine months after the surgery, and I am fully recovered and more confident than before. The doctor from the first consultation until now has been very approachable and has answered and explained all my queries in detail.I will definitely recommend Dr. Kunal Aneja to anyone who wants to go for any surgery or ortho related issue.

review: Recently i visit to the naveda health care hospital for my spinal problem. The doctors was so friendly and suuportive.  Dr aneja and his team really nice to care of thier patients and really would like to say thanx to all of them i feel relaxed in 3 days only under his medication. his hospital is soo clean and the atmosphere is not even looks like a hospital its truly looks like a home. would def prefer to my frends and family if they have any back problems. Thanku so much to u all for such a pleasent behaviour also thanx to the pyshothrypist who give such a good session durin my visit.
reply_text: Thank you for the excellent and elaborate feedback Madhur ! Our team aims for a holistic approach for providing relief and early recovery. Thank you for the encouragement, wish you the best !

tags: None
review: *** ***** ** **** ************ *** **** ****** ** *** **** *** just explains and diagnoses the issues correctly and helps unconditionally with full support. He helped in my case by diagnosing for scoliosis because of which there was sciatica and femoral nerve pain in my leg which couldnt let me sleep whole night. Under Dr.kunal i was referred to physio Dr.Nisar who right from day one worked so professionally well and helped me get rid of my pain that lasted for more than a month. Dr.Nisar helped me get back to normal and sleep well too by giving me the right and best line of treatment from day one by day four i was 80 percent well. I wasted one month on some unprofessional clinic but Dr.Nisar just got me well in few days. Thanks to both the doctors i am happy to be treated well under unconditionally helpful team of these doctors. Thanku
reply_text: Thank you Shivam for the excellent feedback ! Glad to know your speedy recovery from the debilitating pain. Our team works hard to deliver the best results to our patients. Stay active and keep following the precautions and exercises to remain pain-free always. Wish you all the best !

review: I had a wonderful experience with Dr Kunal. Initially I was afraid of being operated for my knee injury but Dr Kunal's ********* *** explanation made me comfortable. I was operated for my right knee medial meniscus tear. The surgery went very well.I was able to move immediately. Dr Kunal is a very humble and kind doctor.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback and trust. Wish you good health !

tags: None
review: Doctor was awesome.. the way he diagnosed and explained was beautiful. I personally recommend the doctor.  The best part is thoroughly examined the reports and back posture. Infact to make a judgement, he got the X-Ray done onspot. I am thankful to the doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you liked our service at Naveda Health Care. At Naveda, we strive to deliver the best of tailored healthcare services to each patient. Our motto is not just to deliver a seamless medical experience, but to provide a healthcare which can make a difference to mankind. We are privileged to have the best health experts on board who share the same vision. Once again, we would like to extend our gratitude for laying your faith on us. We wish you the best of health in the coming days of life. Regards Team Naveda Health Care

tags: None
review:
Dr. Aneja is an orthopedic surgeon beyond excellence. He operated on my sports injury- meniscus tear (knee). Prior to the surgery, even walking and squatting was painful. Today I'm comfortable even running and hiking in the Himalayas.

A true gentleman in his conversations. Although I hope I won't require his services, but without doubt Dr. Aneja is my first and the only preference for any orthopaedic concerns!
reply_text: Thank you for the excellent feedback Surya! Glad that your knee is doing well and you are back to your adventures. Wish you all the very best!
